definition: a pie made of fruit with rich biscuit dough usually only on top of the fruit
details:
noun
- a pie made of fruit with rich biscuit dough usually only on top of the fruit
= example: a pie made of fruit with rich biscuit dough usually only on top of the fruit
= synonyms: deep-dish pie
- tall sweetened iced drink of wine or liquor with fruit
- a person who makes or repairs shoes
= synonyms: shoemaker
